alert.note: Alert for Judith Gap; Melville Foothills; Northern Sweet Grass; Southern Wheatland (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 08 at 3:15AM MST until January 10 at 10:00AM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM TUESDAY TO 10 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...West wind gusts of 60 to 65 mph expected. * WHERE...Judith Gap, Southern Wheatland, Melville Foothills, and Northern Sweet Grass. * WHEN...From 2 PM Tuesday to 10 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...These strong winds could potentially blow down trees and power lines and cause power fluctuations. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Strong crosswinds will make travel difficult along Highway 191 from Big Timber through Judith Gap. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong winds could cause blowing snow which would reduce visibility at times and make roadways slick.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution and consider postponing travel until winds subside, or take an alternate route.

area.areaDesc: Judith Gap; Melville Foothills; Northern Sweet Grass; Southern Wheatland
